entry.title: View near realtime satellite imagery of Earth
entry.summary:
Near Real-Time Satellite Images of Earth

On November 25th UrtheCast launched two cameras aboard a Soyuz rocket. The rocket delivered the cameras to the International Space Station where they are now being installed. Once the cameras are up and running UrtheCast will begin streaming near-realtime satellite imagery of the Earth â€¦
entry.content:
Near Real-Time Satellite Images of Earth

On November 25th UrtheCast launched two cameras aboard a Soyuz rocket. The rocket delivered the cameras to the International Space Station where they are now being installed. Once the cameras are up and running UrtheCast will begin streaming near-realtime satellite imagery of the Earth.

Neat!
